name: Multiplayer Arena Shooter FPS
description:
This is a game I am making to learn how to use Photon Pun for networking and several more aspects of a larger project. Builds and devlogs will be published here as I make progress on the title. With builds expect many bugs as this project is early in development. Known bugs will be detailed in the current build notes below. If you do play an early build of this game and find a bug not listed as known please post a comment detailing the issue.

Within the screenshots are some WIP assets and concept art created by me. The theme and setting is meant to be an exaggerated cold war setting with styling and design language pulled from games such as Team Fortress 2, Metal Slug, Guilty Gear, and other related titles and media.

Began development beginning of February 2022

Latest Devlog: https://medal.tv/games/requested/clips/f1zNrThforESG/d1337uvFbY16?invite=cr-MSxP...

Current known issue notes:

-Occasionally ammo numbers show up incorrectly.

-Joining mid game is non-functional.
